title: Cocoa Liaijak
textPreview: Born in a nearby taiga. Fell into the river and was saved by Aeron when he was 1. Has been living in her home since then.

content.text: Born in a nearby taiga. Fell into the river and was saved by Aeron when he was 1. Has been living in her home since then.
